mapper.select: SELECT gh.gh_name, gh.join_id, gh.gh_soc_num, gh.gh_home_num, gh.gh_phone_num, gh.gh_email, gh.gh_job, gh.gh_fax, gh.gh_bank, gh.gh_acc_hol, gh.gh_bank_num, gh.gh_srttn, gh.gh_year, gh.gh_bsns_num, gh.gh_ofc_num, gh.gh_ofc_name, gh.gh_acad_back, gh.gh_acad_back_file, gh.gh_carrer, gh.gh_carrer_file, gh.gh_addr, gh.gh_dtl_addr FROM TotalApplier ta INNER JOIN GH gh ON ta.APP_NUM_SEQ = gh.APP_NUM_SEQ WHERE ta.APP_NUM_SEQ = #{AppNum}

SELECT ts.ts_name, ta.join_id, ts.ts_soc_num, ts.ts_home_num, ts.ts_phone_num, ts.ts_email, ts.ts_bank, ts.ts_acc_hol, ts.ts_bank_num, ts.ts_exprt, ts.ts_lngg, ts.ts_dsg_crt, ts.ts_active_area, ts.ts_acad_back, ts.ts_acad_back_file, ts.ts_carrer, ts.ts_carrer_file, ts.ts_addr, ts.ts_dtl_addr, ts.ts_post_num FROM Totalapplier ta INNER JOIN Ts ts ON ta.JOIN_ID = ts.JOIN_ID WHERE ta.APP_NUM_SEQ = #{AppNum}

SELECT it.instt_name, ta.join_id, it.instt_soc_num, it.instt_home_num, it.instt_phone_num, it.instt_email, it.instt_job, it.instt_fax, it.instt_bank, it.instt_acc_hol, it.instt_bank_num, it.instt_srttn, it.instt_dtl_srttn, it.instt_year, it.instt_bsns_num, it.instt_ofc_name, it.instt_acad_back, it.instt_acad_back_file, it.instt_carrer, it.instt_carrer_file, it.instt_addr, it.instt_dtl_addr, it.instt_post_num FROM Totalapplier ta INNER JOIN Instt it ON ta.JOIN_ID = it.JOIN_ID WHERE ta.APP_NUM_SEQ = #{AppNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE Ts SET ts_name = #{TsName}, ts_soc_num = #{TsSocNum}, ts_home_num = #{TsHomeNum}, ts_phone_num = #{TsPhoneNum}, ts_email = #{TsEmail}, ts_bank = #{TsBank}, ts_exprt = #{TsExprt}, ts_lngg = #{TsLngg}, ts_dsg_crt = #{TsDsgCrt}, ts_active_area = #{TsActiveArea}, ts_acad_back = #{TsAcadBack}, ts_acad_back_file = #{TsAcadBackFile}, ts_carrer = #{TsCarrer}, ts_carrer_file = #{TsCarrerFile}, ts_addr = #{TsAddr}, ts_dtl_addr = #{TsDtlAddr} WHERE TS_NUM_SEQ = #{TsNum}

UPDATE Instt SET instt_name = #{InsttName}, instt_soc_num = #{InsttSocNum}, instt_home_num = #{InsttHomeNum}, instt_phone_num = #{InsttPhoneNum}, instt_email = #{InsttEmail}, instt_job = #{InsttJob}, instt_fax = #{InsttFax}, instt_bank = #{InsttBank}, instt_srttn = #{InsttSrttn}, instt_dtl_srttn = #{InsttDtlSrttn}, instt_year = #{InsttYear}, instt_bsns_num = #{InsttBsnsNum}, instt_ofc_name = #{InsttOfcName}, instt_acad_back = #{InsttAcadBack}, instt_acad_back_file = #{InsttAcadBakFile}, instt_carrer = #{InsttCarrer}, instt_carrer_file = #{InsttCarrerBack}, instt_addr = #{InsttAddr}, instt_dtl_addr = #{InsttDtlAddr} WHERE INSTT_NUM_SEQ = #{InsttNum}
